name: Samurai Journey (itch)
description:
It is a first demo with a tutorial. Game is compatible with keyboard and xbox gamepad

controls on gamepad

A - jump

x/ right bumper - attack/shoot

b - slide/dash

y - parry

left bumper - switch state

right trigger - slow motion

also f is self destruct button on keyboard

note that game doesn't have sounds and settings(settings button in menu doesn't work) and I have spent zero time optimizing so game might not work great on weak computers, sorry.
